TLINE.TDLINE: SET DATE MASK = 'Buenos Aires, &MES& DD, YYYY'
INCLUDE &TVKO-TXNAM_FUS& OBJECT TEXT ID ADRS LANGUAGE &VBDKA-SPRAS_VKO&
BOTH DAYS INCLUDED AT BUYER´S CALL.
EXTENSION: MAXIMUM &VBDKA-DELCO& DAYS AFTER LAST DAY OF SHIPMENT PERIOD.
PAYMENT: CASH AGAINST DOCUMENTS IN BUENOS AIRES.
DELIVERY BASIS: FOB ARGENTINE PORT/S, AT SELLER OPTION, STOWED AND
WEIGHT, QUALITY AND CONDITION FINAL AT TIME AND PLACE OF LOADING AS PER
CERTIFICATES OR FIRST CLASS INDEPENDENT SURVEYOR, BUYER´S OPTION,
OTHER TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS PER GAFTA 38 AND ARBITRATION RULES GAFTA
INCLUDE &TVKO-TXNAM_KOP& OBJECT TEXT ID ADRS LANGUAGE &VBDKA-SPRAS_VKO&
INCLUDE ZHEX-MACRO-LOGO_AMAGGI_ARG OBJECT TEXT ID ST LANGUAGE ES
For your information the following has been done on &VBDKA-AUDAT&
<k>Efectuamos las entregas según las condiciones siguientes:</>
IF &VBDKA-ZTERM_TX1& NE &SPACE& OR &VBDKA-ZTERM_TX2& NE &SPACE& OR &VBDKA-ZTERM_TX3& NE &SPACE&
INCLUDE &VBDKA-ZTERM& OBJECT TEXT ID SDTP PARAGRAPH L
INCLUDE 'SD_RVADOR01' OBJECT TEXT ID SDVD PARAGRAPH HT
INCLUDE &VBDKA-TDNAME& OBJECT VBBK ID 0001 PARAGRAPH HT
INCLUDE &VBDPA-TDNAME& OBJECT VBBP ID 0001 PARAGRAPH IT
IF &VBDPA-ZTERM_TX1& NE &SPACE& OR &VBDPA-ZTERM_TX2& NE &SPACE& OR &VBDPA-ZTERM_TX3& NE &SPACE&
INCLUDE &VBDPA-ZTERM& OBJECT TEXT ID SDTP PARAGRAPH ID
